timeline.body:
We should be using a multimap PCollectionView here of `filename -> KV<offset, numRecordsInOffset>`

This will alleviate concerns about how much of the map we need to load into memory at any given time since we will do a sort per key (filename).

If you have 10s of thousands of files which possibly have 1000s of offset ranges the other format will take up too much memory.
